div.head: Names and affiliations of applicants (* indicates experimentalists):
div.p: Labesse, Colliandre, Gassel /. NADK Background: LmNADK1, is a tetrameric kinase from Listeria monocytogenes involved in the 2' phosphorylation of NAD.

Wild-type and mutant protein tested: Purine derivates soaked on crystals in I222 form of wild-type NAD kinase were tested, and four complete datasets were collected (resolution= 1.98-2.62 Ã…). Rsym: from 4.9 to 9.9 %. Best refinement ended with Rwork of 20.3 and Rfree of 23.8. Ligands present in mixture.
New crystal form with ligands. Refinement undertaken. In concluion, new complexes obtained.
